CustomField.formula: gr_Admin_Legal_Expns_Total_Allow_Costs__c + gr_Land_Total_Allowable_Costs__c + gr_Relocation_Total_Allowable_Costs__c + gr_Arch_and_Engg_Total_Allowable_Costs__c + gr_Other_Engg_Total_Allowable_Costs__c + gr_Project_Inspection_Total_Allow_Costs__c + gr_Site_Work_Total_Allowable_Costs__c + gr_Demolition_Total_Allowable_Costs__c + gr_Construction_Total_Allowable_Costs__c + gr_Equipment_Total_Allowable_Costs__c + gr_Miscellaneous_Total_Allowable_Costs__c
CustomField.label: Subtotal - Total Allowable Costs
